<style>
    body.silex-runtime .item_{{forloop.index}} {
        background-color: {{item['bg-color']}} !important;
    }
    body.silex-runtime .item_{{forloop.index}} * {
        color: {{item.color}};
    }
    body.silex-runtime .item_{{forloop.index}} a {
        color: {{item['cta-color']}};
        transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out;
        position: relative;
        z-index: 0;
    }
    body.silex-runtime .item_{{forloop.index}} a:hover {
        color: {{item['bg-color']}};
        background-color: {{item['cta-color']}};
        border-radius: inherit;
    }
    body.silex-runtime .item_{{forloop.index}} a::after {
        content: "";
        position: absolute;
        display: inline-block;
        width: 100%;
        height: 2px;
        bottom: -2px;
        left: 0;
        background-color: {{item['cta-color']}};
        transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out;
        z-index: -1;
    }
    body.silex-runtime .item_{{forloop.index}} .cta a::after {
        display: none;
    }
    xxxxxbody.silex-runtime .item_{{forloop.index}} a:hover::after {
        height: 30px;
    }
    body.silex-runtime .item_{{forloop.index}} .cta {
        border-color: {{item['cta-color']}};
    }
    body.silex-runtime .item_{{forloop.index}} .cta:hover {
        color: {{item['cta-color']}};
        border-color: {{item['color']}};
    }
</style>
